设置参数`layout`控制表单布局方式。.en-us: Set the `layout` parameter to control the form layout method.

基于参数`labelCol`、`wrapperCol`的`flex`子参数，实现.en-us: By setting the `labelCol` and `wrapperCol` `flex` subparameters, implement a more flexible distribution of the width of the form label and control part.

设置参数`labelAlign`控制表单项标签对齐方式。.en-us: Set the `labelAlign` parameter to control the alignment of the form item label.

设置参数`labelWrap`控制表单项标签是否超长换行。.en-us: Set the `labelWrap` parameter to control whether the form item label is wrapped.

设置参数`required`控制表单项标签是否额外添加必填标识。.en-us: Set the `required` parameter to control whether the form item label is added with a required mark.

设置参数`tooltip`为表单项标签添加额外提示信息。.en-us: Set the `tooltip` parameter to add extra information to the form item label.

设置参数`validateStatus`为表单项设置不同的校验状态。.en-us: Set the `validateStatus` parameter to set different validation status for the form item.

为具有有效`id`的表单设置参数`enableBatchControl=True.en-us: After setting the parameter `enableBatchControl=True` on the form with a valid `id`, you can batch control the help information of each form item through the parameter `helps`.
After setting the parameter `enableBatchControl=True` on the form with a valid `id`, you can batch control the validation status of each form item through the parameter `validateStatuses`.
After setting the parameter `enableBatchControl=True` on the form with a valid `id`, you can batch control the value of each form item through the parameter `values`.

配合回调函数，对表单中的各个表单项进行精细化的验证控制。.en-us: With the callback function, refine the validation control of each form item in the form.

配合回调函数，对开启批量值控制的表单值进行快捷监听。.en-us: With the callback function, quickly listen to the form value opened with batch value control.
